# About Me

👨‍🔬 **Kamal Chhetri**\
PhD Student \| Plant Pathology \| Virginia Tech University

Welcome to my GitHub site !

I am originally from Nepal and am pursuing my PhD in plant pathology at Virginia Tech University. I am conducting research on fungicide evaluations, early pathogen detection, metagenomics, and decision support system tools. My work focuses on using **bioinformatics** and **statistical analysis** to develop decision-support tools for effective agricultural disease management.
